name: KILL_HUMAN(); - The Wierzchosław Quest
description:
In a futuristic world, where humanoid AI is a part of everyday life, Wierzchosław, one of the best bounty hunters on the planet, is sent on a quest to clear out an android factory, that the androids took control of. Controls (keyboard/controller): WASD/Left Stick - Move Mouse/Right Stick - Aim LMB/Right Trigger - Shoot

Code

  • Maksymilian "Skill" Tym (ig: @skill347_dev)
  • "Mantis" Kozłowski (tw: @imakecoolstuff)

Graphics

  • "Żaba" Mazur (ig: @jo_mazur)
  • Miron "Ruva" Zalewski (ig: @mirrakad)

Sound

  • Marcel Gąsiorowski

Made in 1 week during the 6th edition of Brackeys Game Jam.
